Please long press the microphone icon Switched to Incognito session Incognito session closed Please wait for the reply to be completed before deleting Please enter a question first Cannot send empty content Parsing the image, please wait Network Error: This is already a new session, thank you Cancel Rename The screenshot has been saved to the album, thank you Please talk to the big model first and then take a screenshot, thank you Please install a file manager Please try again later Cancel Feedback Rename Please edit the new name Please fill in a custom prompt word other than the one above System prompt word help System prompts are instructions used to guide the AI is conversational style and role. By setting system prompts, you can ensure that the AI responds with a specific identity, tone, or behavior throughout the conversation. For example, system prompts can be used to allow the AI to play the role of teacher, assistant, or expert, better meeting the needs of different scenarios. Announcement details 302.AI sincerely invites you to join the AI technology exchange group To further promote communication and collaboration in the AI field, 302.AI has created a WeChat group. Everyone is welcome to scan the QR code to join! \n\n\nIn the group,\n you can:\n - Get the latest AI news and technology updates \n- Seek technical support and solutions \n- Exchange experiences and insights with AI enthusiasts and professionals, and participate in various AI-related discussions and events.\n\n\n Due to WeChat restrictions, please use WeChat to scan the QR code or search for WeChat ID: wx_302A1 to add a 302.AI account manager, who will then add you to the group. 302.AI looks forward to your joining us to build an active and supportive AI community! Please select text
Recharge Center Purchase Instructions \n1. Handling Fees: Alipay 3.4% + $0.5 | Credit Card 3.4% + $0.5 | USDT 1.3% (Large-amount wire transfers and automatic top-ups are waived) \n2. Invoice Service: Invoices are available for domestic corporate transfers, back-end top-ups, and international transfers. Contact your account manager for details. \nNotes \nAlipay and USDT top-ups take approximately 5-15 minutes to process. Please be patient. Refresh the page after 15 minutes. If your funds have not been credited, please contact customer service. \nPTC Description \nPTC is a token provided by 302.AI for purchases on 302.AI. 1 PTC = 1 USD, approximately 7 RMB. You can purchase PTC according to the purchase rules first, and then use "PTC" to purchase 302.AI products or services. Once the PTC is purchased, no refunds will be accepted. Recharge Agreement Hot Sale Recommend Recharge Instructions： Next step handsel 20PTC Payment means reading and agreeing 《User Recharge Agreement》 Actual amount paid Pay now Please select the payment amount first Please select payment method first Copy code Thinking Completed
